sourcesContent:
<template>
  <FormUpdate 
      title="Inserir Usuário"
      :width="800"
      :maxHeight="350">
      <template slot="body">
         <!--CONTEUDO-->
        <v-row>
          <v-col>
            <v-form ref="formUsuarios"
                    @submit.prevent="onSave"
                    autocomplete="off">
              <v-container>
                <v-row>
                  <v-col cols="4"
                        style="display: inline-block">
                    <v-text-field label="Login do Usuário"
                                  v-model="field_login"
                                  autofocus>

                    </v-text-field>
                  </v-col>
                  <v-col cols="4"
                        style="display: inline-block">
                        <v-text-field
                          v-model="field_password"
                          :append-icon="show1 ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
                          :type="show1 ? 'text' : 'password'"
                          :rules="[rules.required, rules.min]"
                          @click:append="show1 = !show1"
                          hint="At least 4 characters"
                          label="Senha"
                          :value="field_password = (field_password == null) ? field_password : field_password.toUpperCase()"
                          required
                        ></v-text-field>
                  </v-col>
                  <v-col cols="4"
                        style="display: inline-block">
                        <v-text-field
                          v-model="field_confirmpassword"
                          :append-icon="show1 ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
                          :type="show1 ? 'text' : 'password'"
                          :rules="[rules.required, rules.min]"
                          @click:append="show1 = !show1"
                          hint="At least 4 characters"
                          label="Senha"
                          :value="field_confirmpassword = (field_confirmpassword == null) ? field_confirmpassword : field_confirmpassword.toUpperCase()"
                          required
                        ></v-text-field>
                  </v-col>
                </v-row> 
                <v-row>
                  <v-col cols="12"
                        style="display: inline-block">
                    <v-text-field label="Email"
                                  v-model="field_email">
                    </v-text-field>
                  </v-col>
                </v-row>
              </v-container>
            </v-form>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </template>
  </FormUpdate>
</template>

<script>
import FormUpdate from "@/components/FormUpdate.vue";
import api from '@/services/api.ts';

export default {
  name:"users",
  props: {
      id: Number
  },
  components: {
    FormUpdate,

  },
  data: () => ({
    show1: false,
    field_login: "",
    field_password: "",
    field_confirmpassword: "",
    field_email: "",
    rules: {
      required: value => !!value || 'Required.',
      min: v => v.length >= 4 || 'Min 4 characters'
    }
  }),
  mounted(){
  },
  methods:{

  }
}
</script>
